public void addObstacleListener(ObstacleListener ol)

Parameters:

getDistanceToObstacle

public int getDistanceToObstacle()
Returns:
the distance that the ultrasonic sensor reads

scanForObstacles

public boolean scanForObstacles()
Uses the ultrasonic sensor to see if there is an obstacle in the robot's path. If an obstacle is found, it calls the obstacleListener's object found method. An obstacle within 30 cm of the robot is 1 unit distance away, within 60 cm is two unit distances away, and 100 cm is three unit distances away.

Returns:
true if a new obstacle is detected, false otherwise
